text:
For added clarity: upon submitting a form (whether successful or not) there are no updates made that are perceivable to screen readers (and potentially other AT) users. Such users would be unaware that their interaction has resulted in any change.

This would violate:

WCAG 2.0/2.1 SC 1.3.1 Info & Relationships: Timely Error Notification

and/or

WCAG 2.1 SC 4.1.3 Status Change
